params.about_text: I am Deep Kumar Goenka, a passionate coder specializing in Angular, Spring Boot, and Flask. My curiosity extends to the realms of AI/ML, where I explore intelligent systems that learn, adapt, and make informed decisions. I constantly seek to expand my knowledge and stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in software development. With a focus on exceptional user experiences, I create dynamic and robust applications. My journey as a coder is fueled by the joy of continuous learning, embracing new programming languages, frameworks, and emerging technologies. Deeply committed to growth, I strive to remain at the forefront of the ever-evolving coding landscape.
